author: dependabot-preview[bot]
body:
Bumps [markdownlint](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint) from 0.11.0 to 0.13.0.
Commits - [`6f7c0aa`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/6f7c0aac131f21dd41a2a26810779c993521b733) Update to version 0.13.0. - [`a35b2e4`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/a35b2e40416419fceac173aea8c6081a6c1fc2cc) Update sample output in README.md for recent changes. - [`ec35833`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/ec35833751ccab83a60bf6571947d24082f05d01) Update dependencies: @types/node to 11.12.0, eslint to 5.15.3, js-yaml to 3.1... - [`9b9532e`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/9b9532e163d5368aaa5b2cc559108f903b5c4b0d) Add includesSorted function, use for faster searches of sorted arrays. - [`d7c0d19`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/d7c0d195d7cef4747d66aaa3111a6a176a2c3d4a) Update MD013/line-length with heading_line_length parameter (fixes [#170](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/issues/170)). - [`fa04d29`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/fa04d29485960d633d2b4d28e6c52bf4a4bd0fcc) Enhance MD022/blanks-around-headings with lines_above/lines_below parameters ... - [`debc08b`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/debc08bca178434f9b1e26cf3f63949a5f2747ce) Re-implement MD022/blanks-around-headings to ignore comments and blockquotes. - [`1db87ef`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/1db87ef0c6b9eee11c8358ea8bfd0d0d6e729b98) Update MD031/blanks-around-fences and MD032/blanks-around-lists to ignore com... - [`df2507f`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/df2507f030223a3db14be78675b68b31adcd83b6) Add support for pandoc-style YAML front matter fences ---/... (fixes [#153](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/issues/153)). - [`61d6311`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/61d6311a3ebb9148636925c168c54b9ffce3bbe0) Add front_matter_title parameter to MD025/single-title/single-h1 (refs [#169](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/issues/169)). - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/compare/v0.11.0...v0.13.0)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=markdownlint&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=0.11.0&new-version=0.13.0)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=markdownlint&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=0.11.0&new-version=0.13.0) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) --- **Note:** This repo was added to Dependabot recently, so you'll receive a maximum of 5 PRs for your first few update runs. Once an update run creates fewer than 5 PRs we'll remove that limit. You can always request more updates by clicking `Bump now` in your [Dependabot dashboard](https://app.dependabot.com).
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot ignore this [patch|minor|major] version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor/major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in the `.dependabot/config.yml` file in this repo: - Update frequency (including time of day and day of week) - Automerge options (never/patch/minor, and dev/runtime dependencies) - Pull request limits (per update run and/or open at any time) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired) Finally, you can contact us by mentioning @dependabot.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Only patches for the release branch

comments.author: dependabot-preview[bot]
comments.body:
OK, I won't notify you again about this release, but will get in touch when a new version is available.

If you change your mind, just re-open this PR and I'll resolve any conflicts on it.

title: Build(deps): Bump markdownlint from 0.11.0 to 0.13.0 in /test/common/markdown
